name: Elemental Resonance
desc: Elemental Resonance provides additional effects that correspond to the elements present in the party.

imgDesc.text: When Elemental Resonance requirements are met, the corresponding effect is applied to the party.
Elemental Resonance requirements that are not met will not be applied to the party.

customize.text:
When the party contains at least 4 characters, <color=#ece5d8>Elemental Resonance Effects</color> corresponding to the Elemental Types present in the party will be provided.
Elemental Resonance can be found in any Party Setup (Overworld, Abyss, Domain)
When 2 characters of the same elemental type are in the party, the corresponding element's Resonance Effect will become active. There is also a unique Resonance effect when there are 4 unique elements in the party. In this way, the maximum number of Elemental Resonances for any team is 2.

The party must have at least 4 characters.
The maximum number of Elemental Resonance present in the part is 2.
To activate any Elemental Resonance except <color=#ece5d8>Protective Canopy</color> , 2+ characters of the specific Element are needed.
Trial characters can also be considered for Elemental Resonance. When there are more than 4 characters in the party, only the first 4 characters will be considered for Elemental Resonance.
Inside domains, only the characters present in the party will benefit from Elemental Resonance effects.
Elemental Resonance will activate in Co-op mode as long as the requirements are met.

<color=#ffffff>Elemental Resonance</color>
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Resonance Effect</color>
<color=#ffffff>Fervent Flames</color>
<color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color>
Affected by <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> for 40% less time. Increases ATK by 25%.
<color=#ffffff>Soothing Water</color>
<color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color>
Affected by <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> for 40% less time. Increases Max HP by 25%
<color=#ffffff>Impetuous Winds</color>
<color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color>
Decreases Stamina Consumption by 15%. Increases Movement SPD by 10%. Shortens Skill CD by 5%.
<color=#ffffff>High Voltage</color>
<color=#ffacff>Electro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color>
Affected by <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> for 40% less time. <color=#ffe14b>Superconduct</color> , <color=#ffe14b>Overloaded</color> , <color=#ffe14b>Electro-Charged</color> , <color=#ffe14b>Quicken</color> , <color=#ffe14b>Aggravate</color> , or <color=#ffe14b>Hyperbloom</color> have a 100% chance to generate an <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> Elemental Particle (CD: 5s)
<color=#ffffff>Sprawling Greenery</color>
<color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color>
Elemental Mastery increased by 50. After triggering <color=#ffe14b>Burning</color> , <color=#ffe14b>Quicken</color> , or <color=#ffe14b>Bloom</color> reactions, all nearby party members gain 30 Elemental Mastery for 6s. After triggering <color=#ffe14b>Aggravate</color> , <color=#ffe14b>Spread</color> , <color=#ffe14b>Hyperbloom</color> , or <color=#ffe14b>Burgeon</color> reactions, all nearby party members gain 20 Elemental Mastery for 6s. The duration of the aforementioned effects will be counted independently.
<color=#ffffff>Shattering Ice</color>
<color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color>
Affected by <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> for 40% less time. Increases CRIT Rate against opponents that are <color=#ffe14b>Frozen</color> or affected by <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> by 15%.
<color=#ffffff>Enduring Rock</color>
<color=#ffd780>Geo</color> + <color=#ffd780>Geo</color>
Increases shield strength by 15%. Additionally, characters protected by a shield will have the following special characteristics: DMG dealt increased by 15%, dealing DMG to enemies will decrease their <color=#ffd780>Geo</color> RES by 20% for 15s.
<color=#ffffff>Protective Canopy</color>
Any 4 Unique Elements
All Elemental RES +15%, Physical RES +15%.
